verbs.description: [V: missing] [ARG1: the intimacy in your marriage] i am a 68-year - old man and my wife is a year younger we have been married more than 45 years i still have romantic needs but she does not any physical intimate contact is forbidden she says being intimate makes her feel cheap this issue has caused great tension and stress between us as i still desire a romantic intimate life with her and it seems as though she does not can you suggest a solution for this problem thank natalie bencivenga natalie pg publishing co nbencivenga post - gazette com nbseen editor nataliebenci university of pittsburgh
